useCase.name: Search for Data Packages

preconditions.precondition: The Consumer has access to the search interface

successEndConditions.condition: The search results are displayed to the Consumer

useCase.trigger: The Consumer enters a search query

mainSequence.step: The Consumer enters a search query
The Search Interface sends the search request to the Platform Backend
The Platform Backend queries the Data Registry for data packages
The Data Registry returns search results to the Platform Backend
The Platform Backend displays search results to the Search Interface
The Search Interface shows the search results to the Consumer
